body.name: Linksys Hydra 6 Mesh WiFi 6 Router - MR20EC-AMZ - Dual-Band WiFi Router - Mesh Routers for Wireless Internet - WiFi Mesh Network System - Wireless Router - Connect 25+ Devices, 2,000 Sq Ft
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Inuma.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 5 hrs 11 mins
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 26 mins.
features: LEAVE THE LAG BEHIND: Linksys Hydra 6 WiFi router uses Intelligent Mesh to deliver the speed of WiFi 6, at an affordable price. From next-level gaming to streaming your favorite content, get the fastest connection to everything you do.

THE POWER AND RELIABILITY OF WIFI 6: Experience rock solid connectivity with this dual-band WiFi 6 wireless router. An advanced Qualcomm chipset delivers the ultimate mesh WiFi 6 experience for stable streaming, and wire-like low latency

MORE WIFI FOR MORE DEVICES: Supporting 25+ devices, and up to 2,000 sq ft, this WiFi 6 router sends and receives multiple streams of data simultaneously, providing up to 4x the WiFi capacity so it can handle more gaming and smart home devices

EASY SETUP & CONTROL: Wireless routers set up in minutes with the free Linksys App, allowing seamless management of your WiFi mesh network system. You can view or prioritize which connected devices are using the most WiFi from anywhere.

POWERED BY INTELLIGENT MESH TECHNOLOGY: Eliminate dead zones and dynamically maximize speed with Linksys WiFi mesh networks. Expand the range of your WiFi network by adding nodes to keep your connection going strong
body.description: Introducing the Linksys Hydra 6 Mesh WiFi Router - Using the power of WiFi 6 to deliver lightning-fast internet speeds, seamless connectivity, and unmatched reliability, all in a sleek and stylish package. Linksys Hydra 6 is powered by WiFi 6 technology, so you'll experience fast internet speeds of up to 3.0 Gbps, making it perfect for streaming 4K videos, playing online games, and working from home without lag or buffering. Mesh WiFi 6 technology ensures you'll have a strong and stable signal throughout your home. With the Hydra 6, you can say goodbye to dead zones and weak connections. The device uses intelligent mesh technology to automatically optimize your network and provide you with the best possible performance.Setting up the Hydra 6 is quick and easy. Simply download the Linksys App and follow the step-by-step instructions. You'll be up and running in no time. The app allows you to manage your network, monitor internet usage, and control devices from anywhere. With its powerful WiFi coverage, you can blanket your entire home from the garage to the backyard guest house without needing a WiFi extender or WiFi booster

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,018 in Computers & Accessories (See Top 100 in Computers & Accessories) #204 in Computer Routers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I Needed
reviews.reviewText: My old router would cease working once 200mbps would come into the house. My ISP provides super fast, reliable internet. I pay for 500+ mbps. I purchased this Linksys router and it has solved the speed problem. Setup was easy. It took about 45 minutes from unboxing to enjoying high speed internet. Setup was easy. The phone app did all the work. The device os not bulky. It is small and sleek. It has it's place on the top shelf of my shelving. The signal travels all through the two-bedroom house, the back yard, and almost all the way to the carport, which is pretty far away. Newer routers are too expensive for me, but this one was the right price. Excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up. Works great. Gave support 5 stars because of the help with my old router. Haven't had to call tech support for the new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You don't need to download the app for first time setup!
reviews.reviewText: You may get a router with older firmware. With the older firmware, the default splash screen for managing the app doesn't make it clear how to get to the router setup. IF you have the older firmware there is no hyperlink to bypass the splash screen. To do this, you need to click on the two phones image. This will let you log into the management UI with the password "admin".If you have newer firmware there's a nice big hyperlink to continue to router setup.ONCE YOU SETUP YOUR ROUTER MAKE SURE TO CHANGE DEFAULT ADMIN PASSWORD AND UPDATE FIRMWARE!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good coverage, the connection drops every now and then
reviews.reviewText: I always liked linksys for their quality. This router looks very nice and the sigmal is good, it covers 2 floors in my house. On a down side, I do get my wifi disconnect dropping every few days on some devices and refusing to reconnect until I restart the router. Another issue is the user interface in the web app that feels underdeveloped. The older versions of the web app didn't look flashy but were much more functional. Also the list of connected devices doesn't update in real time and only shows 1-2 devices as online while there should be at least 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You need a cell phone to set it up
reviews.reviewText: This router puts out a weaker signal than my old Asus which I was replacing. It does not have a proper guide for manual installation. You have to go on-line to download the guide which turns out to be for cell phone setup only, not direct cable setup. Lastly poor support. The person I was speaking to was in another country using poor English. He was reading from a script and I could hear the other so-called techs talking with other users with problems. He then laid the phone down on his desk and walked away while I listened to the other conversation. I gave up and hung up the phone. My internet provider was able to walk me through the manual setup. Great job. But the router still is weaker than my old Asus. The route is only 18 feet from my computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, easy and effective
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had Linksys routers for over 4 years. I just got this for an upgrade from my last. Set up was a breeze. Just need to download the Linksys app (I already had it from last router) and go from there. Took about 10 minutes if that. Great connection, easy set up and works wonderfully. This is a mesh version which can connect with other Linksys routers in the home to increase efficiency or you can use it as your main/only router. Would definitely recommend for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to configure, great signal and stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy With My Purchase
reviews.reviewText: So far, this router has done a wonderful job. It's much faster than my previous Linksys router. I'd buy it again.
